summary_and_description:
UI flickering during favicon updates

Issue:
The favicon (link rel="icon") exhibits unnecessary flickering during page navigation, even when:
1. The same icon is used across pages
2. The icon location remains unchanged

Reproduction:
- Navigate between pages on www.mozilla.org
- Observe icon flicker during transitions

Technical Analysis:
Current behavior:
1. Icon reloads/redraws on every page load
2. Occurs before checking if icon is unchanged

Suggested Optimization:
1. Delay icon update until page <head> is parsed
2. Skip redraw if icon URL matches previous page
3. Special case for same-domain navigation

Edge Cases:
- Content negotiation scenarios
- Unspecified image types
- Redirect chains

Impact:
Visual polish issue - creates perception of instability during browsing
